content:
INVESTMENT HYPOTHESIS: Sector Concentration in Energy

Type: neutral
Confidence: 85%
Time Horizon: medium-term
Affected Stocks: Portfolio-wide

Description:
Portfolio is 58.8% allocated to Energy sector. This creates sector-specific risk exposure.

Supporting Evidence:
• Energy represents 58.8% of portfolio
• Sector concentration increases cyclical risk
• Regulatory changes can impact entire sector

Potential Actions:
• Consider reducing Energy exposure
• Add defensive sectors for balance
• Consider sector hedging strategies

Risk Factors:
• Sector-wide downturn risk
• Regulatory/policy risk
• Economic cycle sensitivity
